thing-type.label: HomeWizard Wi-Fi P1 Meter
thing-type.description: This thing provides the measurement data that is available through the http interface of the HomeWizard Wi-Fi P1 Meter.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the P1 Meter.

parameter.name: refreshDelay
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds for polling the P1 Meter.

thing-type.label: HomeWizard Energysocket
thing-type.description: This thing provides the measurement data that is available through the http interface of a HomeWizard Energysocket.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Energysocket.

parameter.name: refreshDelay
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds for polling the Energysocket.

thing-type.label: HomeWizard Wi-Fi Watermeter
thing-type.description: This thing provides the measurement data that is available through the http interface of a HomeWizard Watermeter.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: The IP or host name of the Watermeter.

parameter.name: refreshDelay
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The refresh interval in seconds for polling the Watermeter.

channel-type.label: Total Imported Energy Counter 1
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total imported energy in kWh by counter 1, most commonly used for import during the night or weekend.

channel-type.label: Total Imported Energy Counter 2
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total imported energy in kWh by counter 2, most commonly used for import during the day.

channel-type.label: Total Exported Energy Counter 1
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total exported energy in kWh by counter 1, most commonly used for export during the night or weekend.

channel-type.label: Total Exported Energy Counter 2
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total exported energy in kWh by counter 2, most commonly used for export during the day.

channel-type.label: Current Total Net Power
channel-type.description: This channel provides the current net total power in W. It will be below 0 if power is currently being exported.

channel-type.label: Current Phase 1 Net Power
channel-type.description: This channel provides the current net phase 1 power in W. It will be below 0 if power is currently being exported.

channel-type.label: Current Phase 2 Net Power
channel-type.description: This channel provides the current net phase 2 power in W. It will be below 0 if power is currently being exported. It will be 0 for single phase systems.

channel-type.label: Current Phase 3 Net Power
channel-type.description: This channel provides the current net phase 3 power in W. It will be below 0 if power is currently being exported. It will be 0 for single phase systems.

channel-type.label: Total Imported Gas
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total imported gas in m^3. It does not get updated as frequently as the data in the other channels, the gas_timestamp channel provides the time stamp of the most recent update.

channel-type.label: Gas Update Time Stamp
channel-type.description: This channel provides the time stamp of the total_gas measurement.

channel-type.label: Total Imported Water
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported total imported water in m^3.

channel-type.label: Current Water Rate
channel-type.description: This channel provides the most recently reported current water usage in liters per minute.

channel-type.label: Power Switch
channel-type.description: This channel provides access to the power switch of the Energysocket

channel-type.label: Power Lock
channel-type.description: This channel provides access to the power lock of the Energysocket

channel-type.label: Ring Brightness
channel-type.description: This channel provides access to the brightness of the ring of the Energysocket
